# Canon to Component Map

This document maps abstract roles defined in Canon documents to concrete component implementations in the codebase.
**Generated by Audit**: 2026-01-08

## Cards
- ContentCard (role) → src/components/ui/ContentCard.tsx
  - Canon: CARD_CANON.md
- NavigationCard (role only)
  - Notes: Role defined in CARD_CANON.md. No generic implementation found.
- UtilityCard (role only)
  - Notes: Role defined in CARD_CANON.md. No generic implementation found.
- WorkflowCard → src/components/ui/workflow-card.tsx

- CapabilityCard → src/components/cards/CapabilityCard.tsx
  - Canon: CARD_CANON.md (Role: NavigationCard)

  - Canon: CARD_CANON.md (Role: UtilityCard)
- EditorialCardGridSection → src/components/sections/EditorialCardGridSection.tsx

- FeatureGridSection → src/components/sections/FeatureGridSection.tsx
  - Canon: CARD_CANON.md (Role: ContentCard)
- TestimonialsSection → src/components/sections/TestimonialsSection.tsx
  - Canon: CARD_CANON.md (Role: ContentCard)
- TrainingCategorySection → src/components/sections/TrainingCategorySection.tsx
  - Canon: CARD_CANON.md (Role: NavigationCard)
- Base Card (primitive) → src/components/ui/Card.tsx
